solution_line_template: If the bananas Charles cooked were {multiplier_bananas} times the number of pears he picked, then Charles cooked {multiplier_bananas}*{pears_picked} = <<{multiplier_bananas}*{pears_picked}={bananas_cooked}>>{bananas_cooked} bananas.

Since all the dishes that Sandrine washed were {dishes_more_than_bananas} more than the number of bananas Charles cooked, Sandrine washed {bananas_cooked}+{dishes_more_than_bananas} = {dishes_washed} dishes.
